sentences.sContent: Louis-Jacques-Mandé Daguerre (November 18, 1787 � July 10, 1851) was a French artist and chemist, recognized for his invention of the daguerreotype process of photography.
sentences.sContent_eng: Louis-Jacques-Mandé Daguerre (November 18, 1787 � July 10, 1851) was a French artist and chemist, recognized for his invention of the daguerreotype process of photography.
sentences.sCn: 路易·雅克·曼德·达盖尔（1787年11月18日——1851年7月1日）是法国美术家和化学家，因发明银版照相法而闻名。
